## Collections.CollectorConverter.getOrAdd() method

Gets an item by key if it exists, or creates a new item and adds it using the specified [factory callback](./ts-utils.collections.collectiblefactorycallback.md) if not.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOrAdd(key: string, factory: ResultMapValueFactory<TKEY, TITEM>): DetailedResult<TITEM, ResultMapResultDetail>;
```

key

</td><td>

The key of the item to retrieve.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

factory


</td><td>

[ResultMapValueFactory](./ts-utils.collections.resultmapvaluefactory.md)<!-- -->&lt;TKEY, TITEM&gt;


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;TITEM, [ResultMapResultDetail](./ts-utils.collections.resultmapresultdetail.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Returns [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) with the item if it exists, or [Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md) with an error if the item is not found.
